resources.string: I am a full stack developer in PHP with over Five-year experience in the E-commerce, health care and stock product domain. I used Magento2, CakePHP, Zend, and Laravel framework for backend. Moreover, I use raw PHP and Laravel to create web service API. and HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Query, Angular7, and Bootstrap for front-end, and MySQL for a database
Dynamic web application that auto generate UI using Zend framework
I am a fast learner and solve a problem, passion person, flexible person to work in different business domains.

Diligent software engineer with 5+ years experience in commercial application development. Eager to join an organization to build innovative and cutting edge business solutions for the impressive suite of clients within its global reach. In previous roles, slashed downtime by 25% and ensured 98% on-time project completion. Also identified and dealt with a significant process bottleneck that boosted coding efficiency by 35% when resolved.
I am solutions-oriented and proactive at analyzing processes and business requirements as well as feedback to iresove complex business application problems and ensure quality software delivery
Easily communicates in multiple languages orally and in writing with stakeholders. Employ active listening and mediation skills to build consensus
